item.title: By: Matt
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.description: <p>Great weekend had by all, thanks for a great breakfast Simon!!! I'm glad we didnt drink too much as I wouldnt have been able too cope with that smoke alarm!!!!<br/>Regarding the pool I think it was good of Judith & I to give you a 1 game headstart!!!<br/>See you all soon</p>
item.content:encoded:
Great weekend had by all, thanks for a great breakfast Simon!!! I’m glad we didnt drink too much as I wouldnt have been able too cope with that smoke alarm!!!!
Regarding the pool I think it was good of Judith & I to give you a 1 game headstart!!!
See you all soon

item.title: By: Judith
item.dc:creator: Judith
item.description: <p>I think somehoe you got your score wrong it was 5-2 to myself & Matt, the Pool king! a top weekend thanks Simon.</p>
item.content:encoded: I think somehoe you got your score wrong it was 5-2 to myself & Matt, the Pool king! a top weekend thanks Simon.

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>"Me thnks thou dost protest too much..."</p>
item.content:encoded: “Me thnks thou dost protest too much…”
